channel.title: Compiling error someone plz help i really really need help!
channel.description: Ok i was using a tut from rune-server to add specs and i got these 7 errors: [code]client.java:25379: illegal start of type if (usingSpecial == true) { ^ client.java:25379: <identifier> expected if (usingSpecial == true) { ^ client.java:25449: illegal start of type if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) { ^ client.java:25449: <identifier> expected if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) { ^ client.java:25449: <identifier> expected if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) { ^ client.java:25449: <identifier> expected if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) { ^ client.java:25449: illegal start of type if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) { ^ 7 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code] And i dont know what it means(=P) Heres the link: Copy it and paste into url http://www.runeserver.org/showthread.php?t=17780 ^add a -

item.title: Compiling error someone plz help i really really need help!

It says illegal start of expression or w\e so it must mean that it is not correctly added lol
Go back and look at the tut

item.title: Compiling error someone plz help i really really need help!
item.dc:creator: @redfrodude27 redfrodude27
item.description:
@redfrodude27 wrote:

Here is the code:

[code]if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”))
println_debug("Case 185:

"+actionButtonId);

switch(actionButtonId) {
//These

values speak for themselves
//case

4126: windstrike break;
case 29063://axes//CODE STARTS HERE THAT I ADDED!!!
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1377 &&

specialAmount <= 99) {//dba
specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage2 = 0;
sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy

left.");
}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1377 &&

specialAmount >= 100) {//dba
specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage2 = 0;
startAnimation(1670);
animation(246, absY, absX);
specialAmount -= 100;
}
specialAttacks();
specialAttacks2();
specialAttacks3();
specialAttacks4();
specialAttacks5();
specialAttacks6();
break;
case 33033://halberds
case 29113://bows
case 29163://swords
case 29138://dds
case 48023://whip
try {
if (usingSpecial == true) {
usingSpecial = false;
} else if (usingSpecial == false) {
usingSpecial = true;
}
specialAttacks();
specialAttacks2();
specialAttacks3();
specialAttacks4();
specialAttacks5();
specialAttacks6();
} catch (Exception popo) {
}//code fully ends here
break;[/code]
I REALLY NEED HELP (ill post the second error command soon)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 13, 2008, 12:55:22 PM[/size][hr]Here is the other code:

[code]ProjectileSpec(432, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX,

attacknpc, EnemyY, EnemyX);

calculateSpecial();
hitDiff =

specialDamage;

usingSpecial = false;

specialDamage = 0;

specialDamage2 = 0;
}

usingSpecial = false;

specialDamage = 0;

specialDamage2 = 0;

specialAttacks();

specialAttacks2();

specialAttacks3();

specialAttacks4();

specialAttacks5();

specialAttacks6();
}

if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) {

hitDiff = EnemyHP;
}

public boolean AttackNPC() {
int EnemyX2 = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX;
int EnemyY2 =

server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY;
int casterX = absX;
int casterY = absY;
int offsetX = (casterX - EnemyX) * -1;
int offsetY = (casterY - EnemyY) * -1;
int EnemyX =

server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX;
int EnemyY =

server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY;
int EnemyHP =

server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].HP;
int hitDiff = 0;
int Npchitdiff = 0;
int wepdelay = 0;
CalculateMaxHit();
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);
faceNPC(attacknpc);
//viewTo(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX,

server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY);

if(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].followPlayer < 1

|| server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].followPlayer ==

playerId || inwildy2 == true) {
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1333)) //rune scimi

here

{
PkingDelay = 8;
wepdelay = 8;
}

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4151)) // whip
{
PkingDelay = 3;
wepdelay = 3;
resetanim = 3;
}

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4718)) //dharoks

axe
{
PkingDelay = 16;
wepdelay = 16;
}
[/code]
SOMEONE PLEASE HELP ME!!!
